Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion g7-1150us Notebook PC
Reviews.Author: S. Benkel
Reviews.Content: Really like this computer.  My old one was a 7 year old HP also and I am a PC user only.  Love the size of the screen and the ease of using all the functions.  I am not using this for business though so I probably am not using all the capabilities of this machine.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: bryan kincade
Reviews.Content: I ordered and received my new laptop computer and it arrived well preserved and before the date it was supposed to arrive! I was surprised and happy! The laptop was just as explained in the ad and I love it.
